version_description:
Thank you for using the app!
- Bug fixes

Thank you for using the app! Version 1.1.0 has following new features:

- Add new feature: Badge app icon
- Add heartbeat animation in the Today widget
- Add white color
- Bug fixes and improvements
- IMPORTANT bug fixes

Thank you for using the app! This version has following new features:

- Crash app is fixed
- New app icon
- Add color picker
- And other improvements
- update App Icon

Thank you for loving the inlove app! There're following changes in this new version:

* change the App Icon
* change the default background image
* fix minor bugs

Thanks for using the app! There are new features in this version:

* Add image viewer for anniversary
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thank you for using the app! There are new feature in this update:

* Add new feature: Include End Date (1 day is added)
* Fix bugs about calculating Age and Horoscope
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thank you for using the app! There are new feature in this update:

* Add new feature: Include End Date (1 day is added)
* Fix bugs about calculating Age and Horoscope
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thanks for using the app! This update has following new features:

* new splash screen
* support 5 languages: English, Vietnamese, Czech, French and Turkish
* bug fixes and improvements

* bug fixes and improvements
